## Baked Sweet Potato Chips  
A quick and nutritious dairy-free snack featuring crispy sweet potato slices.  

### Ingredients  
- 1 large sweet potato (about 200 grams)  
- 1 tablespoon olive oil  
- 1/2 teaspoon salt  
- 1/4 teaspoon black pepper (optional)  
- 1/4 teaspoon smoked paprika (optional)  

### Instructions  
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.  
2. Wash and peel the sweet potato. Use a sharp mandoline slicer or a sharp knife to cut into thin, even slices about 1/8 inch thick.  
3. Place the sweet potato slices in a large bowl. Drizzle with olive oil and toss to coat evenly.  
4. Arrange the slices in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet, ensuring they do not overlap.  
5. Sprinkle salt, black pepper, and paprika (if using) evenly over the slices.  
6. Bake for 12-15 minutes, flipping once at the halfway mark, until the edges are crisp and golden brown.  
7. Remove from the oven and let cool for 2 minutes before serving.  

### Notes  
- Keep an eye on the chips after 12 minutes to prevent burning.  
- For extra flavor, sprinkle with your favorite herbs after baking.
